name: Product Field framework
description:
A simple Figma integration of the 'Product Field' Framework. This is made to help product teams aligning perspectives and finding focus over their complex product (More infos here).


It was missing from the community so we made it :) It is simple but we built it the right way, using all the new cool features from Figma (Variants, Auto-layout) when necessary.

If you have any feedback and suggestions, please comment below!


To know more about buzzvil and our amazing Design team, please visit our Design system (design.buzzvil.com)


For more detailed infos on how to use, visit:

https://productfield.com/media/productfield-quickstart-guide.pdf
